Very good! The subversion repository is for the next major Cantera
version,=
 which will be version 2.0.

So for now you should still use CVS and Canter=
a 1.7.x
I hope to have a functional version of Cantera 2.0 out soon - maybe=
 in
a week or so. But let me warn you that the version in the subversion
re=
pository you found is far from functional, and will only lead to
frustratio=
n if you try to use it at this point...

Dave
